title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data available for a series in a chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
EB: Currently, when there is no data for a series in a chart, no error message is shown.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 2. Select a column that does not have any data. 3. Verify that no error message is displayed.
